name: Desjardins RI Emerging Markets - Net-Zero Emissions Pathway ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent reasonably possible and before fees and expenses, the performance of an emerging markets Low CO¿ equity index, the Scientific Beta Desjardins Emerging Markets RI Low Carbon Index (the 'Index'). The investment strategy of the ETF is to invest, directly or indirectly, in a portfolio of emerging markets equity securities that closely matches the Index. The Index is composed of securities selected to significantly reduce the weighted average carbon intensity and ensure that all constituent issuers meet pre-determined ESG standards.
